AboutMe: Italian, living in Madrid, Spain (temporally in Golden, CO, USA); teacher of electronics at higher education since 1994, user of Linux since 1989 (kernel 0.99pl8, or something like that, Slackware distribution on 40 floppies...), user of TeX/LaTeX since even before (on a VAX/VMS!) and hobbyst photographer with a geeky side.
